symptoms.name: continuous_sneezing
symptoms.description: Frequent involuntary contractions of the diaphragm and chest muscles, resulting in a forceful expulsion of air through the nose and mouth.

symptoms.name: shivering
symptoms.description: Shivering is the rapid, involuntary muscle movement that generates heat in response to cold temperatures or emotional stress.

symptoms.name: chills
symptoms.description: Chills are your bodyâ€™s way of raising its core temperature.

symptoms.name: watering_from_eyes
symptoms.description: Also known as excessive tearing or lacrimation, is the condition where the eyes produce an abnormal amount of tears

symptoms.name: sore_throat
symptoms.description: Pain or irritation in the back of the throat.

symptoms.name: hoarse_voice
symptoms.description: A rough or raspy voice, often caused by inflammation or swelling of the vocal cords.

symptoms.name: feeling_tired
symptoms.description: A general sensation of fatigue or lack of energy.

symptoms.name: high_temperature
symptoms.description: An elevated body temperature, also known as a fever.

symptoms.name: blocked_nose
symptoms.description: Difficulty breathing through the nose due to congestion or swelling of the nasal passages.

symptoms.name: runny_nose
symptoms.description: Excessive mucus production and drainage from the nose.

symptoms.name: muscle_pain
symptoms.description: Aches or discomfort in the muscles.

symptoms.name: loss_of_taste
symptoms.description: Inability to perceive or distinguish flavors.

symptoms.name: loss_of_smell
symptoms.description: Inability to detect or identify odors.

symptoms.name: lethargy
symptoms.description: Lethargy is a state of sluggishness, fatigue, or lack of energy, often accompanied by a desire to sleep or rest, and can be a symptom of various health conditions.

symptoms.name: excessive_hunger
symptoms.description: Excessive hunger, also known as polyphagia, is an abnormal increase in appetite.

symptoms.name: increased_appetite
symptoms.description: REMOVE IT

symptoms.name: often_thirsty
symptoms.description: Experiencing excessive thirst

symptoms.name: often_urinate
symptoms.description: Condition of urinating more often than usual

symptoms.name: blurred_and_distorted_vision
symptoms.description: Condition where a person experiences unclear or distorted sight.

symptoms.name: weight_loss
symptoms.description: Reduction of body mass.

symptoms.name: obesity
symptoms.description: Medical condition characterized by excessive body fat.
